header.note: This is the sentence alignement file for THE-theses.fr-1988PA030021. segId begin by 1, tuid = segId

tuv.seg: Cette etude, portant sur l'analyse litteraire assistee par ordinateur, se situe au carrefour de trois differentes disciplines : la litterature, la linguistique et l'informatique.
In this computer-assisted analysis of herzog by saul bellow, three different domains are involved: literature, linguistics and computer sciences.
